question: A need a 45min session to improve my counter drop
answer:
Duration: 45 min  
Session Focus: Counter Drop Improvement  

### Warm-up ###
• 3 min: Drill: Warmup: Compound Boast-Drive + 2 shots  
• 3 min: Drill: Warmup: Compound Boast-Cross-Boast-Drive + 2 shots  

### Activity Block 1 ###
• 3 min: Drill: Boast-Cross-Drive: Boast-Cross-Drive With Counter Drops (Forehand)  
• 3 min: Drill: Boast-Cross-Drive: Boast-Cross-Drive With Counter Drops (Backhand)  
• Rest: 1.5 min  

### Activity Block 2 ###
• 7 pts: Conditioned Game: Drop-Drive: Drop-Drive (any drive) (Forehand)  
  (Rule: Drive: The second bounce of all drives must land behind the T-line....)  
• 3 min: Drill: Boast-Cross-Drive: Boast-Cross-Drive With Counter Drops (Forehand)  
• Rest: 1.5 min  

### Activity Block 3 ###
• 7 pts: Conditioned Game: Drop-Drive: Drop-Drive (any drive) (Backhand)  
  (Rule: Drive: The second bounce of all drives must land behind the T-line....)  
• 3 min: Drill: Boast-Cross-Drive: Boast-Cross-Drive With Counter Drops (Backhand)  
• Rest: 1.5 min  

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------  
End of session.
